items.name: Marketing
items.biography:
I founded the organization when I was just 19 years old. The journey has had its challenges—many of them—but I've always had a clear goal: to help young people reach their dreams.
Over the past 4 years of Center UP, we've created—and continue to create—programs that truly change lives for us and our participants. In the beginning, I did everything on my own—I was both the head of every department and the only employee. Year by year, month by month, we build and share new things with you.
